projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Manage your projects and track their progress here.
projects.name: Name
projects.addProjectDescription: Create a new project to track and analyze market trends.
projects.discardConfirm: Are you sure you want to discard all changes?
projects.selectProjectDescription: Choose a project to view its products
projects.findProductDescription: Search and discover products using AI or manual methods
projects.analyticsDescription: View detailed analytics and insights for your project

settings.title: Project Settings
settings.duplicateDescription: Create a copy of this project with all settings
settings.archiveDescription: Archive this project. It will be hidden from active projects.
settings.deleteDescription: Permanently delete this project and all its data. This action cannot be undone.
settings.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
settings.confirmArchive: Are you sure you want to archive this project?
settings.confirmDuplicate: Create a duplicate of this project?

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Overview of projects, products, tasks and analytics
dashboard.errorLoading: An error occurred while loading dashboard data

charts.trendsDescription: Growth of projects, products, tasks, and reviews over the last 7 days
charts.projectsByStatusDesc: Distribution of projects across different statuses
charts.tasksByStatusDesc: Distribution of tasks across different statuses
charts.reviewsBySentimentDesc: Distribution of reviews by sentiment analysis
charts.productsByPlatformDesc: Distribution of products across different platforms
charts.trustScoreDistributionDesc: Distribution of product trust scores across different ranges

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and set e-mail preferences.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.
appearance.fontDescription: Set the font you want to use in the dashboard.
appearance.themeDescription: Select the theme for the dashboard.

display.title: Display
display.description: Turn items on or off to control what's displayed in the app.
display.sidebarDescription: Select the items you want to display in the sidebar.
display.selectAtLeastOne: You have to select at least one item.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.communicationEmailsDescription: Receive emails about your account activity.
notifications.marketingEmailsDescription: Receive emails about new products, features, and more.
notifications.socialEmailsDescription: Receive emails for friend requests, follows, and more.
notifications.securityEmailsDescription: Receive emails about your account activity and security.
notifications.useDifferentSettingsForMobile: Use different settings for my mobile devices
notifications.useDifferentSettingsForMobileDescription: You can manage your mobile notifications in the mobile settings page.

aiModels.title: AI & Models
aiModels.description: Manage your AI preferences and API keys.
aiModels.enableAIFeaturesDescription: Turn off to disable AI features for your account.
aiModels.aiModelsManagementDescription: Create and manage AI models available in the system
aiModels.manageAIModelsDescription: Manage AI models that users can configure with their API keys.
aiModels.superAdminViewAll: Super Admin: You can view and manage all users' API keys
aiModels.configureApiKeysDescription: Configure API keys for AI models. You can only view your own API keys.
aiModels.noModelsConfigured: No AI models configured. Create one to get started.
aiModels.addAIModelConfigurationDescription: Select an AI model and provide your API key to use it.
aiModels.name: Name
aiModels.createAIModelDescription: Create a new AI model for your account.
aiModels.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration?
aiModels.failedToAddAIModelConfiguration: Failed to add AI Model configuration
aiModels.failedToDeleteAIModelConfiguration: Failed to delete AI Model configuration
aiModels.baseUrlDescription: Optional custom endpoint URL for the model. Leave empty to use default provider endpoint.

account.title: Account
account.description: Update your account settings. Set your preferred language and timezone.
account.name: Name
account.nameDescription: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym.
account.usernameDescription: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym. You can only change this once every 30 days.
account.emailDescription: Your email address. You can manage verified email addresses in your email settings.
account.dateOfBirthDescription: Your date of birth is used to calculate your age.
account.languageDescription: Select your preferred language for the interface.
account.bioPlaceholder: Tell us a little bit about yourself
account.bioDescription: You can @mention other users and organizations to link to them.
account.urlsDescription: Add links to your website, blog, or social media profiles.

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.nameMaxLength: Name must not be longer than 100 characters
validation.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 2 characters.
validation.usernameMaxLength: Username must not be longer than 50 characters.
